name: Smoked Beans Salad Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Smoked Beans Salad Recipe: Baked beans 1 tin Rajma 1 tin Sweet Corn 1 cup Spring Onions (chopped) half cup Capsicum (cubed) 1 Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Oil 2 tbsp Vinegar 2 tbsp BBQ sauce 3 tbspz Cucumber (cubed) 1 Tomato (cubed) 1
instructions: Toss all the ingredients together, leave it on the fridge over night serve over the bed of salad leave.
